thread.title: Leeline launched the World’s Cheapest Rugged Water Proof Smartphone Products
thread.title_full: Leeline launched the World’s Cheapest Rugged Water Proof Smartphone Products

author: prbuzz.com
title: Leeline launched the World’s Cheapest Rugged Water Proof Smartphone Products
text:
Leeline , a tech company from China that has always put high emphasis on research and development, recently came up with futuristic rugged water proof phones. The owners of Leeline have claimed that the Smartphones in their product line are the world’s first rugged mobile phones. They have stressed on the fact that the phones are completely water-resistant as they have manufactured the phones in compliance with Military Specifications and Military Standards. They added that the rugged Smartphone products in their product line are summer-prood, water-proof and shock-proof.
Rugged Smartphones have picked up in popularity in recent times with some of the biggest names in the phone manufacturing industry have come up with robust and rugged Smartphones. With the cheap rugged Smartphone products added to their inventory, Leeline now joins the league of the top Smartphone manufacturers who have already rolled out some of the coolest rugged phones. A top marketing executive from Leeline told the press that they have plans to capture a bigger share of the European and North American markets by the end of 2015 Q4. For this reason only, they have slashed down the prices of the rugged phones to a record low.
Leeline rugged Smartphone products have all the standard features that are common to any other Smartphone. However, the ‘rugged’ feature is what makes these phones special and different from the rest. According to the manufacturers, the phones are resistant to a number of environmental challenges.
“We purposely kept the price of these phone low as we want people to come forward and buy the product first. We know many people would take interest in rugged Smartphone and it’s not that the gadget freaks would be the only one in the list. Similarly, we do not want to project it as a high-end Smartphone. The rugged Smartphone is essentially an everyday gadget and that’s the best part of it. We do not want to make it so expensive so that regular users cannot afford it”, said the CEO of Leeline during a recent press conference.
About the Company
Leeline is a China based multifarious company. The rugged Smartphone and tablets are some of their flagship products.
